name: C4T-M3cH Adventures
description:
Videogame originally made for the MechJam II 

Controls:

w-a-s-d: move
e / mouse-left: shoot
space: fly

Aliens are attacking the cat republic! C4T-M3cH has been deployed and you are its pilot. Can you fight long enough for the citizens to evacuate?

The game and all the assets were made by me, except for the music which i took from the amazing guys of freepd.
